means: [人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 坎尼 McCann的变体

sentence.Network_en: Some analysts believe he has made a canny political manoeuvre.
sentence.Network_cn: 一些分析家认为，他的这一政治举措很高明。

sentence.Network_en: Johnson was plainly a canny individual.
sentence.Network_cn: 约翰逊显然是个狡猾的人物.

sentence.Network_en: A canny investor would need to predict when the dollar will once more start tumbling.
sentence.Network_cn: 精明的投资者需要预计到美元何时会再次大跌。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根联想记忆法词汇教程(二)|联想记忆法背单词 ... cancel v. 取消 canny adj. 精明的；节俭的 canopy n. 树荫，华盖，蚊帐.
另外一种非常重要的算法是坎尼(Canny)算子,这是坎尼在1986年写的一篇论文里仔细论述的。他给出了判断边缘提取方法性能的指标。
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... canine 犬的，似犬的 canny 精明仔细的 canon 经典，真作.
GRE红宝书LIST6（一）_单词的幸福生活_新浪博客 ... cane 手杖, 藤条, 细长的茎 canny 精明的, 谨慎的 canon 教规; 正典, 经典圣经.

list.abs: He made a very canny move ., 他作出了很精明的举动.
still , Jamie Dimon , JPMorgan Chase's canny boss , will see this as a time of great opportunity .但是，摩根大通精明的老板JaminDimon认为这是一个绝佳机会。
he was like a canny wolf prowling in a forest of trees of his own creation .他就像一只狡猾的狼，在他自己造的一座树林里徘徊觅食。
many blockbuster products have their roots in bright ideas , rigorous research and canny marketing , rather than luck .很多拳头产品都归根于好的创意，严谨的调查和精确的市场分析，而并非运气。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (originally Scots): from can (the obsolete sense 'know') + -y

entry.tran: 精明的；狡黠的;头脑灵活的
entry.def: A canny person is clever and able to think quickly. You can also describe a person's behaviour as canny .

example.ex: He was far too canny to risk giving himself away...
example.tran: 他非常精明,不会冒险暴露自己。

example.ex: A canny investor would need to predict when the dollar will once more start tumbling...
example.tran: 精明的投资者需要预计到美元何时会再次大跌。

means.word_mean: 1. showing self-interest and shrewdness in dealing with others;

auth_sentence.content: The Kremlin regarded him as a canny ingrate.

auth_sentence.content: To others albeit a minority it represents a canny investment.
auth_sentence.res_content: To others albeit a minority it represents a canny investment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To others albeit a minority it represents a canny investment.

auth_sentence.content: Yet this canny critic has slipped through the cracks of renown.

sentences.cn: 约翰逊显然是个狡猾的人物。
